To be used by the GUI after the hero is burned to dead to change its state to 'n' so that the appropriate image can be used.

state - Variable in class logic.Element
The state of the element.
state - Variable in class logic.Game
The state of the game: 0 - game continues; 1 - hero wins, 2 - hero loses.
